name: Project Desert
description:
Journey in anti-gravitation sci-fi glider via artificial Intelligence.

Place: desert sector.

Goal: collect 15 containers in desert and return to mother-ship.
Game support gamepad and keyboard.

Keyboard controls:

  • W | Move Forward
  • A | Turn Left
  • S  | Move Back
  • D | Turn Right
  • ↑ | Pitch Down
  • → | Roll Right
  • ← | Roll Left
  • ↓ | Pitch Up
  • X | Brake
  • Space | Brake
  • Escape | Quit

Game by Andrew Rain. Used additional assets from Unreal Engine marketplace and free 3D-models. Used music by Gregory Semenov. Made with Unreal Engine 5.

Special thanks: Paragon Interactive.
